item.title: Maria del Pilar add a quote by Julia Cameron
item.description: "Life is a spiritual dance and that our unseen partner has steps to teach us if we will allow ourselves to be led. The next time you are restless, remind yourself it is the universe asking 'Shall we dance?" -- Julia Cameron

item.title: Maria del Pilar add a quote by Nick Williams
item.description: "The way to win our heart back is to venture again, to risk giving, receiving and trusting again, and of course to risk getting hurt again, but deciding to forgive and to no longer use the hurt or fear to keep ourselves in prison." -- Nick Williams

item.title: Maria del Pilar add a quote by George J. Thompson
item.description: "I want to teach you to express hostile feelings without humiliating or destroying others in the process." -- George J. Thompson

item.title: Maria del Pilar add a quote by David W. Johnson
item.description: "Strength is the willingness to take risks in a relationship, to disclose yourself with the intention of building a better relationship." -- David W. Johnson

item.title: Maria del Pilar add a quote by Suze Orman
item.description: "Believing you are worthy of love means that you believe I deserve to be treated well - with respect and dignity. I deserve to be cherished and adored by someone. I am worthy of an intimate and fulfilling relationship. I won't settle for less than I deserve. I will do whatever it takes to create that for myself." -- Suze Orman
